ing: 1/2 (15 ounce) can black beans, drained and rinsed
1 clove garlic, minced, or more to taste
des: "I created and devoured this guac-bean dip in college because it's very cheap, filling, and healthy. When I am low on fiber, this is the perfect snack or meal. Serve with pita or tortilla chips."
ins:
Mix avocado, black beans, lime juice, and garlic together in a microwave-safe bowl. Sprinkle with Cheddar cheese.
Microwave dip on high until cheese is melted, about 1 minute. Season with sea salt if desired.
